DOC.brief_summary: This study determine impact education specific low extremity stretch MS-related spasticity . The study evaluate acceptance efficacy education stretch use randomize control pilot trial .
DOC.brief_title: Developing Testing Comprehensive MS Spasticity Management Program
DOC.detailed_description: Participants 2-4 visit depend program assignment . All participant screening/baseline follow-up visit . Participants intervention program 2 additional visit group people MS view discus DVDs spasticity education stretch low extremity MS spasticity practice stretch exercise learn . They ask track exercise electronically paper 4 week . Participants compensated participation .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis definite MS At least 18 year old Able walk 25 foot independently common assistive device need Presence spasticity selfreport interfere usual daily activity Have email account familiar use Willing track daily exercise 4 week Fluent English Other medical behavioral condition would limit participation completion study .
